tunable choose_local_tries 0
tunable choose_local_fallback_tries 0
tunable choose_total_tries 50
tunable chooseleaf_descend_once 1

# devices
device 0 osd.0
device 1 osd.1
device 2 osd.2

# types
type 0 osd
type 1 host
type 2 chassis
type 3 rack
type 4 row
type 5 pdu
type 6 pod
type 7 room
type 8 datacenter
type 9 region
type 10 root

# buckets
host vpm113 {
	id -2		# do not change unnecessarily
	# weight 0.100
	alg straw
	hash 0	# rjenkins1
	item osd.0 weight 0.100
}
host vpm145 {
	id -3		# do not change unnecessarily
	# weight 0.100
	alg straw
	hash 0	# rjenkins1
	item osd.1 weight 0.100
}
host vpm061 {
	id -4		# do not change unnecessarily
	# weight 0.100
	alg straw
	hash 0	# rjenkins1
	item osd.2 weight 0.100
}
root default {
	id -1		# do not change unnecessarily
	# weight 0.300
	alg straw
	hash 0	# rjenkins1
	item vpm113 weight 0.100
	item vpm145 weight 0.100
	item vpm061 weight 0.100
}

# rules
rule replicated_ruleset {
	ruleset 0
	type replicated
	min_size 1
	max_size 10
	step take default
	step chooseleaf firstn 0 type host
	step emit
}

# end crush map

api/v2/cluster/<fsid>/crush_map.api/v2/cluster/2f221b7e-2739-4da0-b363-c:
"# begin crush map
tunable choose_local_tries 0
tunable choose_local_fallback_tries 0
tunable choose_total_tries 50
tunable chooseleaf_descend_once 1

# devices
device 0 osd.0
device 1 osd.1
device 2 osd.2

# types
type 0 osd
type 1 host
type 2 chassis
type 3 rack
type 4 row
type 5 pdu
type 6 pod
type 7 room
type 8 datacenter
type 9 region
type 10 root

# buckets
host vpm113 {
	id -2		# do not change unnecessarily
	# weight 0.100
	alg straw
	hash 0	# rjenkins1
	item osd.0 weight 0.100
}
host vpm145 {
	id -3		# do not change unnecessarily
	# weight 0.100
	alg straw
	hash 0	# rjenkins1
	item osd.1 weight 0.100
}
host vpm061 {
	id -4		# do not change unnecessarily
	# weight 0.100
	alg straw
	hash 0	# rjenkins1
	item osd.2 weight 0.100
}
root default {
	id -1		# do not change unnecessarily
	# weight 0.300
	alg straw
	hash 0	# rjenkins1
	item vpm113 weight 0.100
	item vpm145 weight 0.100
	item vpm061 weight 0.100
}

# rules
rule replicated_ruleset {
	ruleset 0
	type replicated
	min_size 1
	max_size 10
	step take default
	step chooseleaf firstn 0 type host
	step emit
}

# end crush map
"
